title: [Large-Scale] Language Education Practical Competency Enhancement Course Utilizing Visual Instructional Design Language

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary instructional design theories, experience with digital tools, and foundational understanding of language education concepts (grammar, vocabulary, text analysis)
context.additional_context: Iterative design improvement through formative assessment feedback and real-time collaboration tools in BYOD environments. Emphasis on visual modeling specialized for language learning contexts (reading, writing, expression).

learning_goals: Learners can identify core components of visual instructional design languages (E2ML/PoEML/coUML) with 90% accuracy and apply them to language learning activity design.
Based on real-world language education job scenarios, learners can create visual models with 80% completeness and clearly express text structures and vocabulary usage.
Through peer evaluation, learners can iteratively improve design models at least twice and provide feedback considering expressive skills and reading comprehension.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
